==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|よう|か|yomi=o}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ようか}}

# A [[demon]] or [[demonic]] [[entity]]
# A demonic [[transformation]]

====Synonyms====
* {{l|ja|霊化}} ({{l|ja|れいか}}, ''[[reika]]''): a [[soul]], or [[spirit]]ual [[entity]]; or a [[spiritual]] [[transformation]].
* {{l|ja|魔化}} ({{l|ja|まか}}, ''[[maka]]''): a demon or [[magic]]al being; or a demonic or [[magical]] transformation.
* {{l|ja|鬼化}} ({{l|ja|おにか}}, ''[[onika]]''; or {{l|ja|きか}}, ''[[kika]]''): a [[devil]], or a [[devilish]] transformation.
